GetByShopId.Statement: SELECT w2_ProductDefaultSetting.shop_id, w2_ProductDefaultSetting.init_data FROM w2_ProductDefaultSetting WHERE w2_ProductDefaultSetting.shop_id = @shop_id

Upsert.Statement:
DECLARE @count int SELECT @count = COUNT(shop_id) FROM w2_ProductDefaultSetting WHERE w2_ProductDefaultSetting.shop_id = @shop_id
IF @count = 0 BEGIN INSERT w2_ProductDefaultSetting ( w2_ProductDefaultSetting.shop_id, w2_ProductDefaultSetting.init_data, w2_ProductDefaultSetting.date_created, w2_ProductDefaultSetting.date_changed, w2_ProductDefaultSetting.last_changed ) VALUES ( @shop_id, @init_data, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), @last_changed ) END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE w2_ProductDefaultSetting SET w2_ProductDefaultSetting.init_data = @init_data, w2_ProductDefaultSetting.date_changed = GETDATE(), w2_ProductDefaultSetting.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_ProductDefaultSetting.shop_id = @shop_id END
